pr_title: [CALCITE-3794] Stop simplifying using predicates if the pulled up predicates is empty

timeline.message:
[CALCITE-3794] Return directly if there is no pulled up predicate

Also some cosmetic changes.

[CALCITE-3794] Return directly if there is no pulled up predicate

Also some cosmetic changes.

timeline.bodyText: outer == TimeUnit.QUARTER is always false here.
timeline.author: chunweilei

timeline.bodyText: What if we do not return early ? Is there any error occurs ?
timeline.author: danny0405

replies.bodyText: No, but it would bring some extra unnecessary overhead since all the following process still need to execute.
replies.author: chunweilei
